column2: Marjorie Taylor Greene Sinks To New 'Level Of Dumb' In Biden Speech Criticism

In an address to Congress the president outlined a vast â€œAmerican Families Planâ€ which among other thingsÂ would create freeÂ universal pre-K and two years of tuition-free community college. But the QAnon-supporting Greene who was stripped of her House committee assignments for spouting tinfoil-hat theories bashed the proposal as just another conspiracy. â€œFederally funded school from age 3 to 20 doesnâ€™t sound like education it sounds like indoctrinationâ€ she tweeted. â€œAll at your expense. By force in the form of taxes.â€ Federally funded school from age 3 to 20 doesnâ€™t sound like education it sounds like indoctrination. All at your expense.  By force in the form of taxes. Twitter educated Greene reminding her that tax dollars cover the public education system already in place. Oddly Greene seemed to generally understand the concept of free public schoolsÂ in a tweet earlier in the dayÂ backing parents revolting against student mask mandates. â€œTaxes pay for the schoolsâ€ she wrote. Children should be indoctrinated at home instead! pic.twitter.com/vJwI5dsrmv CORRECTION: An earlier version of this article stated that federal funds pay for public education. While federal funds are one source local and state taxes account for the bulk of school funding. The article has been updated to reflect that public schools are primarily funded by tax dollars.
